name: StartupSteps
tag_list: video, video-courses, e-learning, turorials, how-to, mentor, jury, judges, rolemodels, giving-back
overview:
“Empowering Entrepreneurs to give back”

StartupSteps ApS is a startup based at Copenhagen and we’re looking for great people to join us. We are accepted into the CPH School of Entrepreneurship incubation programme (CSE Lab). We’re are currently re-building our platform for a high quality interaction for serious Entrepreneurs.

Next big thing we are hitting is revolutionizing the way people trade their knowledge and at the same adding extensive value for content marketing. We love the video media and would be trilled to know what you would love to disrupt related to creating and being an Entrepreneur?

We, the founders are: Jonas Alexandersson, Nynne Christiansen and Brian Gjerstrup. We’re all very driven, energetic, have a global mind-set and aged between 25 and 30. We are diverse in our various backgrounds of education, sectors and startups – being both non- and for-profit. Our team further contains: Kim Balle head of e-learning & multimedia, Alejandro our developer, Jorge our CTO and finally Rasmus who is our designer.
